name: Autumn Shooting
description:
This is my submission for the "Great Harvest Game Jam", its a game where your goal is to get 3000 points by destroying pumkins which fall from the sky, its a short and easy game which you can play on your browser.

Credits Links:
Main Menu & Game music by : https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC-t0mtx38daJoDMoiWrmIaw

Win Scene music by: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCsLlqLIE-TqDq3lh5kU2PeA

Sound Effects by:  https://audiosoundclips.com/?s=8+bit

I hope you enjoy this game, if you have any ideas to add,  please do tell me in the comments.
